com.communote.server.persistence.hibernate

Class HibernateDaoImpl<T extends Serializable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.dao.support.DaoSupport
      • org.springframework.orm.hibernate3.support.HibernateDaoSupport
        • com.communote.server.persistence.hibernate.HibernateDaoImpl<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of the entity this dao is for.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    HibernateDao<T>, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NavigationItemDaoImpl, ResolvedTopicToTopicDaoImpl

    @Transactional
public abstract class HibernateDaoImpl<T extends Serializable>
extends org.springframework.orm.hibernate3.support.HibernateDaoSupport
implements HibernateDao<T>
    Generic Dao for general Hibernate support .
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/
